name: //run.OS
description:
//run.OS

a simple, casual, Typing game comes in mind, this game will test your Hacking Capabilities (well actually a little bit).

You wanted to become a member of a hacking society, but you must prove yourself worthy to join, so you need  to Hack 10,000 currency in order to become worthy Hacker, and one more thing...

"YOUR PC IS OUTDATED PIECE OF SHIT"

but don't worry it has some amount of Ram, so basically it can store Data. Your currently running on Rengar_OS, which is a Hacking System OS.

And Remember stay Anonymous or else, Government will come for you.

Note:

This game is currently still on development, I intentionally set the resolution to fixed at 720x480, cause my main Objective here is the Performance of the game. If you encounter Bugs please report them so i can smash the heck of it. And one more thing, i still need some ideas for the game, feel free to give me one. Thanks :D
